benchmark_details.name: EcomInstruct
benchmark_details.overview: EcomInstruct is the first E-commerce instruction dataset, comprising 2.5 million instruction data and 134 tasks, designed to enhance generalization capabilities for E-commerce specific tasks.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide an instruction-tuning dataset tailored for E-commerce tasks and improve the generalization ability of models in the E-commerce domain.

data.source: Collected from various academic websites and data competition platforms, as well as atomic tasks constructed using E-commerce data.
data.annotation: Manually curated and automatically generated using ChatGPT

methodology.calculation: Metrics are calculated based on model output compared to ground truth.
methodology.interpretation: Higher scores indicate better performance in the tasks undertaken by the model.
methodology.baseline_results: ChatGPT, BLOOM, and BLOOMZ serve as baseline comparisons.
methodology.validation: Cross-dataset evaluation on various unseen tasks.
